overview: n this imaginative retelling of the classic fable, the Paul Mesner Puppets transport the story to a magical world of vegetables. The daughter of fervent gardeners Okra and Romaine, the beautiful Rapunzel is snatched away by an evil witch. Locked in a tower high in the witch's castle, Rapunzel is forced to live out her days in solitude and despair. Her only hope: a brave prince intent on freeing her from her imprisonment.
title: The Paul Mesner Puppets: Rapunzel
